questions.text:
#### Q1. When developing a backlink strategy, what approach would be most beneficial?

- %OPTION% Guest post the article to as many sites as possible
- %OPTION% Create an infographics and share it with relevant bloggers
- %OPTION% Create diverse and unnatural links
- %OPTION% Distribute links in comment sections of websites

#### Q2. What is a key reason the URL `domain.com/apparel/jackets` is preferable to the URL `domain.com/p=141`?

- %OPTION% It is longer
- %OPTION% It is not preferable
- %OPTION% It uses structured markup
- %OPTION% It is readable to a human

#### Q3. Which HTTP response status code would indicate a page has been moved permanently?

- %OPTION% 410
- %OPTION% 302
- %OPTION% 200
- %OPTION% 301

#### Q4. You notice a website is serving HTML to a Search Engine than to a human user. What is this an example of?

- %OPTION% Spam injection
- %OPTION% Cloaking
- %OPTION% Sneaky Redirect
- %OPTION% Splicing

#### Q5. What would significantly improve Google's ability to a non-YouTube video in its Search Results?

- %OPTION% Provide a 150 x 80 pixel thumbnail image
- %OPTION% Add Schema.org VideoObject
- %OPTION% Convert .mp4 videos to .mov
- %OPTION% Embed video objects with JavaScript conditionals

#### Q6. Google primarily determines indexing and ranking by crawling which version of a page?

- %OPTION% Responsive version
- %OPTION% Submitted version
- %OPTION% Mobile version
- %OPTION% Desktop version

#### Q7. You want to identify which US state has the most search interest for a particular keyword. What tool would help you determine this?

- %OPTION% Google Analytics
- %OPTION% Google Keyword Planner
- %OPTION% Google Search Console
- %OPTION% Google Trends

#### Q8. You want to block crawlers from accessing your entire website. What robots.txt entry would you use?

- %OPTION%

```markdown
    User-agent: Allbots
    Disallow: \*
```

- %OPTION%

```markdown
    User-agent: /
    Disallow: \*
```

- %OPTION%

```markdown
    User-agent: /
    Disallow:
```

- %OPTION%

```markdown
    User-agent: \*
    Disallow: /
```

#### Q9. Which result is most likely if you use an interstitial pop-up that requires a user to take action before you load the content of the page?

- %OPTION% Both the pop-up and the content of the page will be indexed
- %OPTION% The pop-up will be indexed instead of the desired body content
- %OPTION% An interstitial pop-up is treated the same as a soft 404
- %OPTION% The pop-up will be ignored, and the content of the page will be indexed correctly

#### Q10. You notice a particular product in an e-commerce storefront is no longer indexed, despite no technical issues. What is a likely reason for this?

- %OPTION% No title or meta description tags were provided
- %OPTION% The Keywords is too competitive
- %OPTION% Robots.txt is configured to allow access
- %OPTION% The product is out of stock

#### Q11. All byline dates for articles are suddenly no longer visible on a `website's` listing within Google Search. Assuming no changes have been made to the site programming or content, what is the most likely cause?

- %OPTION% The site has been delisted from Google Search
- %OPTION% A Google News sitemap was not provided within 30 days of setting up a publisher center account
- %OPTION% The site kept updating the dates to make the content appear fres, without changing
- %OPTION% The articles have aged more than 365 days without any significant updates to the content or the site

#### Q12. Which approach is not advisable to Geo-targeting your website?

- %OPTION% Using a gTLD with subdomain
- %OPTION% using URL parameters
- %OPTION% Using a ccTLD
- %OPTION% Using a gTLD with a subdirectory

#### Q13. You have been asked to help a big e-commerce brand optimize their website for search engines. They currently have thousands of products listed on their website. What is your most appropriate first step?

- %OPTION% Recommend that they add more products
- %OPTION% Work on compressing image files
- %OPTION% 302 redirect all product pages to URL that contains target keywords
- %OPTION% Register the business with a Google My Business account.

#### Q14. What Does The Term "Sandbox" Mean In SEO?

- %OPTION% The Box With Paid Ads That Appear When You Perform A Search.
- %OPTION% This Is Where Sites Are Kept Till They Get Mature Enough To Be Included In The Top Rankings For A Particular Keyword
- %OPTION% A Special Category Of Sites That Are Listed In Kid-safe Searches
- %OPTION% The First 10 Search Results For A Particular Keyword.

#### Q15. What Is Anchor Text?

- %OPTION% It Is The Main Body Of Text On A Particular Web Page
- %OPTION% It Is The Text Within The Left Or Top Panel Of A Web Page
- %OPTION% It Is The Visible Text That Is Hyper Linked To Another Page
- %OPTION% It Is The Most Prominent Text On The Page That The Search Engines Use To Assign A Title To The Page

#### Q16. Which Google search query should be used to return only PDF documents that reference Microsoft?

- %OPTION% Microsoft + .pdf
- %OPTION% "Microsoft" + "pdf"
- %OPTION% Microsoft AND "pdf"
- %OPTION% Microsoft filetype:pdf

#### Q17. Which link is not crawlable?

- %OPTION% `<a href="http://domain.com">`
- %OPTION% `<a onclick="newwin('domain.com')">`
- %OPTION% `<a href="http://domain.com" class="blue">`
- %OPTION% `<a href="../category-2/page">`

#### Q18. Which choice represents the best header structure?

- %OPTION%

```markdown
    H1: How to Bak Bagels
    H2: Ingredients
    H3: Dry Ingredients
    H4: Wet Ingredients
    H2: Instructions
    H6: Reviews
```

- %OPTION%

```markdown
    H1: How to Bak Bagels
    H1: Ingredients
    H1: Dry Ingredients
    H1: Wet Ingredients
    H1: Instructions
    H2: Reviews
```

- %OPTION%

```markdown
    H1: How to Bak Bagels
    H2: Ingredients
    H3: Dry Ingredients
    H3: Wet Ingredients
    H2: Instructions
    H2: Reviews
```

- %OPTION%

```markdown
    H1: How to Bak Bagels
    H2: Ingredients
    H4: Dry Ingredients
    H5: Wet Ingredients
    H6: Instructions
    H1: Reviews
```

#### Q19. All byline dates articles are suddenly no longer visible on a website's listing within Google Search. Assuming no changes have been made to the site programming or content, what is the most likely cause?

- %OPTION% The site has been delisted from Google Search
- %OPTION% The site kept updating the date to make the content appear fresh, without changing the content.
- %OPTION% The articles have aged more than 365 days without any significant updates to the content or the site.
- %OPTION% A Google New sitemap was not provided within 30 days of setting up a Publisher Center account

#### Q20. What is an example of a Google search result that can be found in position zero?

- %OPTION% Google Ads result
- %OPTION% featured snippet
- %OPTION% related searches
- %OPTION% autocomplete

#### Q21. When creating accessible video content, what should you consider including?

- %OPTION% transcript
- %OPTION% thumbnail
- %OPTION% Flash Player
- %OPTION% event tracking

#### Q22. You are optimizing a website that sells supplies for banking donuts. Which approach is most appropriate to drive more organic traffic?

- %OPTION% Buy donutbakingsupplies.com and 301 redirect to your website
- %OPTION% Add the keyword "donut supplies" to every page.
- %OPTION% Create a new blog with high-quality donut recipes
- %OPTION% Join a link farm to rapidly build inbounnd links.

#### Q23. Why is it important to be mindful of outbound follow links?

- %OPTION% There is a limit to how many links you can create.
- %OPTION% all of these answers
- %OPTION% Any follow links reduce your PageRank by 1.
- %OPTION% Your site's reputation is tied to the sites you link to.

#### Q24. Which statement is true about JSON-LD?

- %OPTION% It has no relation to JSON.
- %OPTION% It is the only structured data format available.
- %OPTION% It is considered the most complicated approach to adding structured data.
- %OPTION% It is Google's preferred structured data format.

#### Q25. What is a key reason why duplicate content might cause an issue with ranking?

- %OPTION% It creates an inability to use canonical URLs, which dramatically reduces crawl effectiveness,
- %OPTION% It requires using a 302 redirect, which dilutes PageRank.
- %OPTION% It triggers an immediate manual action penalty, which delists an entire domain until the duplicate content is removed.
- %OPTION% It makes it difficult for a search engine to determine the original and authoritative content source.

#### Q26. What attribute would you use to describe the content of an image?

- %OPTION% tabindex
- %OPTION% longdesc
- %OPTION% src
- %OPTION% alt

#### Q27. You are researching keywords for a client and creating list for an optimization plan. Which is _not_ a recommended method of creating keyword lists?

- %OPTION% synonyms and related words
- %OPTION% queries about benefits, features, problems
- %OPTION% how-to and question-based queries
- %OPTION% focusing on only high-volume, high-popularity words

#### Q28. You want to get a rough idea of how many searches per month a particular search term gets. Which tool do you use?

- %OPTION% Google Keyword Planner
- %OPTION% Google Tag Manager
- %OPTION% Google Search Console
- %OPTION% Google Suggest

#### Q29. Changing the title tag and/or meta description will have a measurable impact on your \_.

- %OPTION% RSS
- %OPTION% CTR
- %OPTION% PPC
- %OPTION% LSI

#### Q30. How do keywords change as people progress through the buying cycle?

- %OPTION% They move from simple to more complex as searchers gather more information and then refine their choices.
- %OPTION% The stay simple, as searchers try to use as few words as possible.
- %OPTION% The keywords do not change much at all.
- %OPTION% They move from complex to simple, as searchers find answers to their questions.

#### Q31. Which technique is an example of black hat SEO?

- %OPTION% cloaking
- %OPTION% keyword research
- %OPTION% useful content
- %OPTION% on-page optimization

#### Q32. A local accountant wants to start attracting more business directly from Google organic search. What is the best piece of advice to give to her?

- %OPTION% Use the pharse "local accountant" as a keyword to focus her website on.
- %OPTION% Focus on short-tail keywords.
- %OPTION% Register her business with a Google My Business account.
- %OPTION% Leave a link to her website in the blog comments of popular accounting websites.
#### Q33. What is the anchor text in this code sample? `Blue Gloves` - %OPTION% Blue Gloves - %OPTION% href - %OPTION% catalog/ - %OPTION% gloves.html

#### Q34. **\_** analysis allows you to review requests made to your web server to identify insights such as how ofter a crawler arrives, what pages have 404 errors, and most crawled pages

- %OPTION% Log file
- %OPTION% HTTP/2
- %OPTION% Cron job
- %OPTION% Resource packet

#### Q35. Which page title references content that is evergreen

- %OPTION% Mega List of Teams Going to the Olympics
- %OPTION% Complete Coverage of Microsoft's Latest Announcement
- %OPTION% The Future of SEO in 2020
- %OPTION% How to Reheat Pizza

#### Q36. You load a page and start reading an article, and suddenly the content on the page moves. What metric is used to quantify this impact on user experience?

- %OPTION% First Meaningful Paint (FMP)
- %OPTION% Recalculated Style Timing (RST)
- %OPTION% Latent Loading Signal (LLS)
- %OPTION% Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)

#### Q37. What is this code is an example of?

```<script type="application/ld+json">
{
   "@context": "https://schema.org",
   "@type": "Organization",
   "url": "http://www.domain.com",
   "name": "Bradley Corp.",
   "contactPoint": {
      "@type": "ContactPoint",
      "telephone": "+1-555-555-5555",
      "contactType": "Customer service"
    }
}
</script>
```

- %OPTION% meta tag
- %OPTION% HTTP response
- %OPTION% XML sitemap
- %OPTION% structured data

#### Q38. Which search query would be most difficult to determine search intent?

- %OPTION% XBox live coupon
- %OPTION% Microsoft Office 365
- %OPTION% LinkedIn login
- %OPTION% LAX airport directions

#### Q39. When you conduct a search, what are the bolded words within the search listing description?

- %OPTION% suggested search terms
- %OPTION% related search queries
- %OPTION% keywords that match the search query
- %OPTION% words with a `<b>` tag assigned in their meta description

#### Q40. Which acronym is used to describe the page a user sees after submitting a search?

- %OPTION% SERP (Search Engine Results Page)
- %OPTION% INDX
- %OPTION% PARS
- %OPTION% SEM

#### Q41. Which statement is true regarding the use of social signals, such as LinkedIn shares, by Google in its ranking algorithm?

- %OPTION% Google does not use social signals to determine rank
- %OPTION% Social signals are identical to backlinks
- %OPTION% Social signals are used to determine topic authority
- %OPTION% Social signals provide a benefit only if they have structured data markup

#### Q42. A user clicks an internal link resulting in this redirect chain: `http://domain.com -> https://domain.com -> https://domain.com/`. In this example, what is being consumed unnecessarily?

- %OPTION% redirect allotment
- %OPTION% crawl budget
- %OPTION% velocity scale
- %OPTION% domain authority

#### Q43. You are planning for the development of an e-commerce website. Which approach will be more beneficial for rankings?

- %OPTION% Optimize the front page of your website to drive traffic from all category search terms.
- %OPTION% Optimize product category pages to drive traffic from individual category search terms.
- %OPTION% Optimize all pages on the site for all category search terms.
- %OPTION% Optimize product pages to drive traffic from individual category search terms.

#### Q44. What is the relationship of click depth to PageRank?

- %OPTION% The deeper the click depth, the lower the PageRank
- %OPTION% PageRank and click depth have no relation
- %OPTION% The deeper the click depth, the higher the PageRank
- %OPTION% Click depth and PageRank are equal

#### Q45. What is a popular technique for writing content with the goal of having it appear in a features snippet?

- %OPTION% Write the question in a headline tag, and then answer it below in a format that matches the snippet type.
- %OPTION% Use the features snippet schema and apply an object that matches the correct snippet type.
- %OPTION% Google manually generates featured snippets, so there is no special technique.
- %OPTION% Submit the content through Google Search Console, and tag it with the correct snippet type.

#### Q46. What is a common best practice for handling search result pages on a blog's built-in site search?

- %OPTION% Set site research results to no-index.
- %OPTION% Do not use site search.
- %OPTION% Set site search to 404.
- %OPTION% Add a canonical from the search result page to the home page.

#### Q47. What might help a search engine understand the difference between an article on a dog bark versus tree bark?

- %OPTION% tertiary analysis
- %OPTION% ranked choice trees
- %OPTION% semantic analysis
- %OPTION% knowledge graphs

#### Q48. A webpage has this tag: `<title>Brad's Bagels: How to Bake a Bagel</title>`. However, the Google search result for this page displays this title: \_Brad's Bagels: Baking Bagels in the Oven\_. What is a likely explanation?

- %OPTION% The title tag was placed within the <HEAD> section of the webpage, but not before the meta content tags, so Google cannot identify the actual title.
- %OPTION% The page is using structured data to define an alternative title object, which allows the search engine to pick a preferable version.
- %OPTION% A breadcrumb navigation is in use, which overrides the title tag supplied in the HTML.
- %OPTION% Google generated a new title using text on the page that more closely matched the search query.

#### Q49. What alt attribute should be assigned to an image of a decorative line being used to separate content

- %OPTION% alt=""
- %OPTION% alt="Thin black line being used to seperate two blocks of content"
- %OPTION% alt="dec"
- %OPTION% alt="thin-line"

#### Q50. Your site serves identical content when you visit domain.com/page or domain.com/page?ref=123. What should you implement?

- %OPTION% parameter stripping
- %OPTION% URL cloaking
- %OPTION% a 302 redirect
- %OPTION% a rel=canonical link

#### Q51. What data vocabulary is most commonly used when marking up content on a page?

- %OPTION% vocabulary.org
- %OPTION% RDFa.org
- %OPTION% schema.org
- %OPTION% data-vocabulary.org

#### Q52. According to Google, what type of content includes topics such as news, legal issues, financial advice, and medical information?

- %OPTION% RSS
- %OPTION% KYC
- %OPTION% YMYL
- %OPTION% BDB

**Explanation:** `Google describes YMYL (Your Money or Your Life) sites/pages as ones that could potentially impact a person’s happiness, health, financial stability, or safety.`

#### Q53. When would it be necessary to 301 redirect every page on a site?

- %OPTION% when parameters are used in URLs
- %OPTION% when migrating from HTTP to HTTPS
- %OPTION% when launching a new redesign
- %OPTION% when creating a new subdomain

**Explanation:** From article: [301 Redirects for SEO](https://ahrefs.com/blog/301-redirects/) (2020)

#### Q54. What would contribute to a low bounce rate?

- %OPTION% Content does not match search intent.
- %OPTION% Page returns 404 error.
- %OPTION% Content reflects search intent.
- %OPTION% URL uses parameters.

#### Q55. What should be as consistent as possible across the web when developing a local SEO strategy?

- %OPTION% backlinks
- %OPTION% NAP
- %OPTION% LRP
- %OPTION% inbound links

1. [reference](https://support.google.com/business/answer/7091)
2. [reference #2](https://www.smartinsights.com/search-engine-optimisation-seo/how-to-adjust-your-nap-profile-for-local-seo/)

#### Q56. A user enters a search \_ to retrieve results from a search engine?

- %OPTION% query
- %OPTION% parser
- %OPTION% bar
- %OPTION% link

#### Q57. The search query "How to make donuts without yeast" is an example of what?

- %OPTION% fresh keyword
- %OPTION% operative keyword
- %OPTION% short-tail keyword
- %OPTION% long-tail keyword

#### Q58. What tool enables companies to display extra information within the natural search results without the need of any structured data?

- %OPTION% Google Input Tools
- %OPTION% structured data testing tool
- %OPTION% Google Tag Manager
- %OPTION% Google My Business

#### Q59. Your client is ready to start a blog. but has read that they should put the blog on a subdomain instead of subdirectory in order to create more external links to their website. How would you advise your client about this strategy?

- %OPTION% Not only should the blog be on a subdomain, but each of the major navigation areas should be on separate subdomains in order to increase the number and value of the links into the primary domain.
- %OPTION% It is best to have the blog on a subdirectory and build links to primary domain.
- %OPTION% It is an advisable choice as it will enable interlinking between the domains and increase the number of links.
- %OPTION% The blog should be on a separate URL to avouud building too many links between the same domain or IP.

#### Q60. Blog author pages, each with only one sentence about the author, are at risk of being flagged as **\_** content.

- %OPTION% non-indexable
- %OPTION% irrelevant
- %OPTION% biased
- %OPTION% thin

#### Q61. What is a common benefit to long-tail keywords?

- %OPTION% They are less competitive, and may have higher conversion rates.
- %OPTION% Long-tail keywords are no longer relevant in today's SEO landscape.
- %OPTION% They are less grandular, so you capture broader searches.
- %OPTION% They are more competitive, but drive significantly more traffic.

#### Q62. You have been asked to help a big e-commerce brand optimize their website for search engines. They currently have thousands of products listed on their website. What is your most appropriate first step?

- %OPTION% Set campaign goals.
- %OPTION% Conduct a technical audit.
- %OPTION% Conduct a backlink audit.
- %OPTION% Determine keyword strategy.

#### Q63. You are optimizing a large e-commerce website. Which strategy will likely yield the most organic traffic?

- %OPTION% Launch a Smart Shopping Campaign in Google Ads.
- %OPTION% Optimize the home page of your website.
- %OPTION% Optimize each product page with a unique product-specific keyword.
- %OPTION% Optimize your product category pages.

#### Q64. Google's Search Quality Evaluator Guidelines describe that experts should write content, especially YMYL content. This is one of the principles seen in the commonly used acronym\_\_

- %OPTION% A.C.E
- %OPTION% L-E-A-F
- %OPTION% T.R.U.S.T.E.D
- %OPTION% E-A-T

[Reference](https://moz.com/blog/google-e-a-t)

#### Q65. Why might using a subdirectory in place of a subdomain be beneficial?

- %OPTION% Using a subdirectory is never preferable to using a subdomain.
- %OPTION% The subdirectory will allow for keyword dilution.
- %OPTION% The subdirectory will benefit from the backlinks the domain has acquired.
- %OPTION% The subdirectory is better for the end user experience.

#### Q66. What is the best way to provide a search engine with crawl instructions?

- %OPTION% Use the <crawl> tag.
- %OPTION% Use the search engine's Remove URL tool.
- %OPTION% Use a robots.txt file.
- %OPTION% Use structured data

#### Q67. You are optimizing a site that receives a lot of user-submitted comments, many of which contain a promotional links. According to SEO best practices, how should you treat the comments?

- %OPTION% Be sure links are using keywork-rich anchor tags
- %OPTION% Disallow each link submitted
- %OPTION% Set links in comments to be Nofollow
- %OPTION% Bold important keywords in comments

#### Q68. What is not a primary component of a SERP snippet?

- %OPTION% Description
- %OPTION% Title
- %OPTION% Cache
- %OPTION% URL

#### Q69. A landing page with no internal or external links is an example of what?

- %OPTION% Dynamic hierarchy
- %OPTION% Doorway content
- %OPTION% Orphaned content
- %OPTION% Flat Hierarchy

#### Q70. Informational, navigational, commercial, transactional are four categories of what?

- %OPTION% keyword search intent
- %OPTION% crawling
- %OPTION% indexing
- %OPTION% HTTP responses

en.TITLE: Skill Assessments Quizzes
en.DESC:
Collection of questions and answers on different subjects aimed to help
you test your knowledge before an important job interview!

Data from __data__. UI by __bandinopla__

es.TITLE: Questionarios de evaluación de habilidades
es.DESC:
Colección de preguntas y respuestas sobre diferentes temas orientadas a
ayudarte a testear tu conocimiento antes de una importante entrevista de trabajo! 

Datos de __data__. UI por __bandinopla__
